info.st_nr:
W: Hi, I'm interested in taking some dance classes.

M: OK, we have beginner, mid-level, and advanced classes.

W: I've practised for two years. Which class should I take?

M: I think the mid-level class is right for you.

W: Great! What kind of dances are included in the class?

M: We focus on hip-hop and jazz, so if you don't have the right outfit, you can check out the sports shop next door.

W: I already have jazz shoes and pants, so I think I'll be fine. One more question: is there any opportunity for students to perform?

M: Of course! Every year, there is a big show at the local theatre where all the teachers and students perform.

W: That sounds wonderful. I'm really looking forward to it.

M: Welcome aboard. You'll have fun!

xtlist.xt_nr: ets_th1 What class will the woman take?
ets_th2 Where does the conversation most likely take place?
